Summary: dull metalic object seam to hover ten move northwest short puff vapor trail then disappeared straight up
trends: There have been no other sightings in Silver Springs
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailssitting in my back yard. happen to look up and see it. plastic bag caught floating in the air. thinking it was a bag I've seen them before was just looking at it and it seam to stop. I kept looking wondering what it was, not a plastic bag! small puff of vapor it moved due east, then another puff of vapor and it headed straight up disappeared to fast to explain. amazed shocked alittle bit. after just sat there looking around the sky. like I said little puff of vapor went straight up out of sight. vapor did'nt last but for a couple of seconds if that. disc shape with a very small dome on top of it, dome ran along the whole distance of the object but was very short.
